tasks.label: Build Web with MT timestamp
tasks.command: ts=$(TZ="America/Denver" date +"%m/%d/%y %I:%M%p MT" | sed -e 's/AM/am/' -e 's/PM/pm/'); flutter build web --target lib/main_web.dart --dart-define=BUILD_TIME="$ts"

tasks.label: Dev: Build + Restart Server (MT timestamp)
tasks.command: ts=$(TZ="America/Denver" date +"%m/%d/%y %I:%M%p MT" | sed -e 's/AM/am/' -e 's/PM/pm/'); flutter build web --target lib/main_web.dart --dart-define=BUILD_TIME="$ts" && lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; GEMINI_API_KEY=$GEMINI_API_KEY python3 -m uvicorn webapp.app:app --reload --port 8000
